name: ITLibMediaItemLocationType
desc: These constants specify the location type of a media item.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The media item location type is unknown.

items.name: case file
items.desc: The media item location refers to a local file.

items.name: case URL
items.desc: The media item location refers to a URL, such as a podcast.

items.name: case remote
items.desc: The media item location refers to a remote file.
